tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_data (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date DATE,
    account_number INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE financial_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department VARCHAR(50),
  revenue DECIMAL(10, 2),
  expenses DECIMAL(10, 2),
  profit DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE budget_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department VARCHAR(50),
  budget_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  actual_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  variance DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE forecast_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  month DATE,
  revenue_forecast DECIMAL(10, 2),
  expenses_forecast DECIMAL(10, 2),
  profit_forecast DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE FinancialData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  year INT,
  month INT,
  revenue DECIMAL,
  expenses DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE BudgetData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  year INT,
  department VARCHAR(50),
  budget_amount DECIMAL,
  actual_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ForecastData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  year INT,
  month INT,
  forecasted_revenue DECIMAL,
  forecasted_expenses DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE financial_data (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE accounts (
  account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_name VARCHAR,
  account_type VARCHAR,
  opening_balance DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE budgets (
  budget_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  year INT,
  total_budget DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE forecasts (
  forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  forecast_date DATE,
  expected_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  account_id INT,
  transaction_type VARCHAR,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL
)
